CustomField.description: BODEV-127: When Lead is coming from an external web-to-lead form for referral, User who enters the form should specify his/her email address for later analysis purpose.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When a Lead is submitted by an external web-to-lead form for referral, email address of the person who submitted the form will be captured in this field.
CustomField.label: Lead Submitter's Email
